document.full_text: gold rose above $1,500 an ounce on wednesday for the first time ever as the dollar wilted, oil rose, worries over the u.s. economic outlook boosted demand for the metal as a haven and rising inflation lifted asian demand.
document.title: gold breaks $1,500 as investors seek security
